attributes.action: Provide free or dicounted bus travel for all secondary school children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present only children who have to travel over 3 miles to a school in their catchment area are entitled to free bus travel. We believe that all children should be entitled to free or discounted bus travel regardless of catchment area. If your child chooses a school out of catchment that is over 3 miles away they should be given a free or discounted bus pass to allow them to travel to school

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
